General_Description: '''Remnant of the Ancients''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra visited the [[Artisan Smith|artisan]] [[blacksmith]] in [[Kirrha]], [[Phokis]] to find a way to repair [[Amorges]]' [[sword]].
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Amorges is dealt with, and I have his blade. But it's useless... Broken, and the metal is strange. I should find a blacksmith.
While passing through the town of [[Kirrha]] in Phokis, Kassandra spotted a smith at [[Sargon]]'s [[Oikos of the Olympians]].
*'''Kassandra:''' The Oikos of the Olympians has a blacksmith known for his skill in working rare metals. I should take the sword there.''
Kassandra travelled to the Oikos of the Olympians in Phokis. She spoke with an artisan smith.
*'''Artisan Smith:''' ''[[Kopis]] or ''{{Wiki|basket|kophinos}}''—what do you need?''
Kassandra took out the broken blade and showed it to the blacksmith.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Have you seen anything like this before?''
*'''Artisan Smith:''' ''[[Jupiter|Zeus]]' balls! Do you know what this is?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Broken?''
*'''Artisan Smith:''' ''It's [[adamant]]ine! This stuff is priceless! And I don't mind telling you I'm the one man in the islands who knows how to properly work it. I'll need more adamantine to fix it, though. A lot more.''
Kassandra nodded and took out several [[Order of the Ancients medallion|Image of the Ancients]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Will this help? The metal looks similar.''
*'''Artisan Smith:''' ''What the—where in [[Hades]] are you getting this stuff? No, I don't want to know.''
Kassandra handed over more necklaces to the blacksmith.
:If Kassandra had insufficient metal, the following brief scene played out.
:*'''Kassandra:''' ''Is this enough to repair the sword?''
:*'''Artisan Smith:''' ''I wish I could say yes, but then I'd be lying... Bring me more, and I'll make you a sword fit for a [[Greek mythology|god]].''
:Kassandra left to collect more necklaces and returned after killing every member of the [[Order of the Ancients]].
:*'''Artisan Smith:''' ''You're back! You got it, didn't you? I can smell Adamantine, and you smell good!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Here. Don't tell me you need more, because I've run out of necks to cut it from.''
*'''Artisan Smith:''' ''There's real passion behind your words, I can feel it. I'm personally glad to say that these will do. The blood on them is a nice touch, by the way. Helps with the quenching.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I do what I can.''
*'''Artisan Smith:''' ''Wait here. This won't take long.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra collected the Image of the Ancients from all the members of the [[Order of Hunters]], [[Order of the Storm]], and [[Order of Dominion]], smelting the adamantine the necklaces were made of to repair [[The Sword of Kings]].
